name: Random Tweets of Kindness
description:
It's easy to forget to show the people you know and care about the kindness and love they deserve, and that's where #RToK (Random Tweets of Kindness) comes into play!

Follow the rules to fill out the sheet with people to perform acts of kindness for, as well as what acts of kindness you'll be doing, then do as many as you want! Save the sheet(s) as reminders of the good you've done or recycle em, whatever you want, they're your sheets after all 🧡

What you'll need: A d6 (or number generator), a Twitter account (everything is manual, you won't be linking or connecting anything no worries!), the third page of this document (or some paper), and something to write with.

Note: this game goes out to Angel, my fiancée, for suggesting I make a game for Random Acts of Kindness day. It also goes out to Carla, my good friend, for her remarkable game, Loving Accountability, which was a massive inspiration for this game (so much so that, if you like mine at all, I wholeheartedly recommend that you go grab Loving Accountability as well! In fact, do it anyway lol)
